column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I love to borrow books from the library because it is so easy .
#id=2
#text=I also love it because if I return things on time , it 's totally free !
#id=3
#text=I went to the library today to look for some gardening books .
#id=4
#text=I did n't feel like using the computer to find the books , so I went through the dewey decimal system until I got to the gardening section .
#id=5
#text=There were so many shelves of gardening books !
#id=6
#text=I found a few that I liked and decided I needed a basket .
#id=7
#text=I got one from the circulation desk .
#id=8
#text=After that , I decided to go find a movie and a video game for my family to enjoy .
#id=9
#text=I browsed through the movies in alphabetical order and found a copy of Night at the Museum for my family to enjoy .
#text=I also found a copy of Mario Kart for the Wii .
#text=I took my items up to the front desk and checked them out .
#text=I will have to return them within a week .
